comment: I had her for Cross Culture Comm, and she is a really great professor. She really made the class interesting and helped me to understand other cultures at a different level. Oh and I could tell that she enjoys teaching this subject so that makes the class feel a lot better.

she's kind of hard to get to know because she is not very personable. but she is a great teacher. I have taken her for 3 different classes and she is probably one of the best teachers I have had at SPSU.
This class was pretty easy. Come to class and definitely participate in discussions. She isn't helpful outside of class and doesn't respond to emails.
It's a pretty hard class. Take it as serious as any core or engineering class because she can really tell who practices and who doesn't. Work hard on the first speech. Speech.

She's very nice and keeps the course interesting throughout the year. She explains exactly what she wants and is always willing to help anyone that may have any extra questions. She grades firmly but faily. I would definitely reccomend this professor.

Good teacher. You know exactly what she expects on speeches. She can be a rough grader on them. As long as you take a couple hours preparing for each speech, it will show when you deliver it and in your grade.
